summary: Raised to deal in cold blooded death, the teenage assassin girl Azumi must defeat three evil warlords while also battling her own heart.
cast: Aya Ueto|Kenji Kohashi|Hiroki Narimiya|Takatoshi Kaneko|Yûma Ishigaki|Yasuomi Sano|Shinji Suzuki|Eita|Shôgo Yamaguchi|Shun Oguri|Joe Odagiri|Aya Okamoto|Minoru Matsumoto|Hideo Sakaki|Ken'ichi Endô|Kazuya Shimizu|Tak Sakaguchi|Ryô|Masatô Ibu|Kei Satô|Kazuki Kitamura|Naoto Takenaka|Yoshio Harada|Richard Cansino|Katsushi Ikeda|Bansuke Kasamatsu|Takehiro Katayama|Fuuma Kosaka|Yûki Kuroda|Shôichirô Masumoto|Michael McConnohie|Misako Nagashima|Takeshi Nakano|Masaki Nishimura|Kazufumi Ohba|Bryce Papenbrook|Eden Riegel|Houken Sonoda|Terrence Stone|Yukiharu Sugiyama|Asuka Sukuna|Yasunari Takeshima|Kazuki Tsujimoto|Kanae Uotani|Hiroaki Yamazaki|Hideo Kojima
title: Azumi
